song_lyrics: He asur nar itanā batā mai kaun hū, mai kaun hū,
Tere prāṇ harane āyā hū, mai kaun hū, mai kaun hū.
Nā tum manuṣhya ho aur nā pashu,
Nā din hai nā rāt hai,
Tu ghar me hai yā bahār hai?
Nā ghar me hū nā bahār,
Par mai to hū dahelīj par.
Tu ākāsh me hai yā pṛuthvī par?
Nā mai ākāsh me hū nā pṛuthvī par,
Mai to hū āpanī gaud me.
Mere hāth me shastra hai yā astra?
Nā shastra he nā astra he,
Ye to baḍe baḍe nakhu hai.
Āj pāp kā sarva nāsh ho.
Jay Jagadīsh hare, jay Jagadīsh hare!
title: He asur nar itanā batā me kaun hu

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1048: unknown

Category: Nrutya Gito
